scripts.fauna-local: docker start faunadb-fql-x || docker run --rm -d --name faunadb-fql-x -p 8443:8443 -p 8084:8084 -v $PWD/fauna-local-config.yml:/fauna/etc/fauna-local-config.yml gcr.io/faunadb-cloud/faunadb/enterprise --config /fauna/etc/fauna-local-config.yml
scripts.fauna-local-alt-port: docker start faunadb-fql-x-alt-port || docker run --rm -d --name faunadb-fql-x-alt-port -p 7443:8443 -p 7084:8084 -v $PWD/fauna-local-config.yml:/fauna/etc/fauna-local-config.yml gcr.io/faunadb-cloud/faunadb/enterprise --config /fauna/etc/fauna-local-config.yml
